projects.description: A web-based mentorship platform aiming to facilitate the matching process between users seeking to learn skills (Mentees) and individuals who can offer guidance in sought-after skills (Mentors). Over the duration of the Capstone project, I served as my team of four's client liaison (which entailed preparing and taking extensive notes of weekly hour-long meetings with the client, then relaying this information to my team to streamline our Scrum Sprint). Built with React on the front-end, Node for the back-end, and Firebase for our database.
